name: Copy Chicken Paste2
description:
Copy, Chicken, Paste is a 2D puzzle-platformer.

Help the chicken to find her eggs! But the tooty bird is out of control: the only way to guide it is by moving her favorite food. 

Help her to achieve her objective by moving the environment. How to do it? Use CTRL+X to cut, CTRL+C to copy or CTRL+V to paste! But be careful, you have a limited number of objects....

CONTROLS:

CTRL+C to copy

CTRL+V to paste

CTRL+X to cut

CTRL+Z to undo

CTRL+Y to redo

CTRL+O to open/close

CTRL+R to Restart

CTRL+H for help

Done in less than 48h by a team of a programmer and a designer.

To rate the game: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/rate/696350
